get.description: Get an out-of-band OAuth URL which can be opened in any browser on any device to provide authorization credentials for this request's authenticated user. The generated URL will not require user to sign-in to Gatana; instead it will directly start the OAuth authorization flow with the remote MCP server.
Get a list of all the credentials associated with the server (user-, profile-, and server-scoped credentials).

parameters.name: all

schema.description: If "true", retrieves credentials for all users (only available for admins).

parameters.description: If "true", retrieves credentials for all users (only available for admins).

delete.description: Delete all credentials associated with this server. Requires manage permission on the server.

get.description: Download the source code of the MCP server as a zip file.

put.description: Upload source code zip file to update the MCP server source code.

get.description: List all secret stores for the tenant
Get a secret store by ID
List all secret mappings for a store

post.description: Test fetching a secret from the store using a secret identifier (e.g., AWS ARN, GCP secret path)

200.description: NDJSON stream of exec output. Each line is a JSON object (ExecNdjsonLine) followed by a newline.

transportType.description: Transport type: httpstreaming, sse, stdio, or hosted

url.description: The URL of the remote MCP server

secretIdentifier.description: The secret identifier (e.g., AWS ARN, GCP secret path, Vault path, or Infisical secret name)
